content.query:
--External tables an be created in both Serverless and Dediated Sql pools.
--use abfss path for dedicated pool and https path in serverless
-- https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/statements/create-table-as-select-azure-sql-data-warehouse?view=azure-sqldw-latest
-- Hadoop type supported and performs process hadoop based type


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE census_external_table
(
    decennialTime varchar(20),
    stateName varchar(100),
    countyName varchar(100),
    population int,
    race varchar(50),
    sex    varchar(10),
    minAge int,
    maxAge int
)  
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/parquet/',
    DATA_SOURCE = population_ds,  
    FILE_FORMAT = census_file_format
)
GO

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM census_external_table
